author: James Hookway
title: Malaysian Opposition Seeks to Slay Goliath With Smarter Campaigning
text:
TANGKAK, Malaysia—Many political operatives prefer to work in the shadows, away from public scrutiny and the prying eyes of their opponents. Not Rafizi Ramli.
The opposition strategist is hitting the campaign trail as hard as any candidate ahead of Wednesday’s elections to drum up donations for his crowdfunded data outfit, Invoke, hoping to guide Malaysia’s ragtag opposition alliance to victory after more than 60 years of one-party rule.
...
